subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: Colt McCoy, the Browns quarterback, was not cleared to practice again Wednesday, keeping him sidelined since he was hit in the face mask by Pittsburgh’s James Harrison on Dec. 8.
snippet: Colt McCoy, the Browns quarterback, was not cleared to practice again Wednesday, keeping him sidelined since he was hit in the face mask by Pittsburgh’s James Harrison on Dec. 8.
